# 404 Tech Found

> 404 Tech Found is a LATAM-focused deep-tech pre-incubator turning breakthrough science into venture-grade companies. We support founders in AI, Biotech, and Hardware through pre-incubation programs, fellowships, and events.

## About
- Deep-tech pre-incubator based in Lima, Peru
- Three specialized houses: AI, Biotech, Hardware
- Built by founders, for founders
- Bilingual platform: Spanish (primary) and English

## Programs
- Pre-Incubation (12 weeks, open): 1-on-1 mentorship, expert network, workshops, Demo Day
- Fellowship (6 months, coming soon): Equity-free funding, lab access, investor introductions

## Events
- SpecHack: 10-day global hackathon (Jun 19-28, 2026). "The hackathon where the spec is the product."

## Houses
- House of AI: Language models, computer vision, and autonomous agents applied to real LATAM problems
- House of Biotech: Synthetic biology, molecular diagnostics, and precision agriculture for a continent with unique biodiversity
- House of Hardware: Robotics, industrial IoT, and medical devices â€” from prototype to manufacturing

- Website: https://404techfound.org
- Email: hola@404techfound.com
- Location: Lima, Peru
